mathrubhumiye nidahasa wenuwen diwi nothaka satan wadunu abhitha ranawiruwan wenuwen niwasa thana dime api wenuwen api niwasa wadapiliwela 13 wani adiyara yatathe nuwaraeliya disthrikkaye ranawiruwan wetha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage athin niwasawala yathuru piriname.janadhipathithumage mangapenwima yatathe rajya aarakshaka ha nagarika sanwardhana amathyanshaye lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathagesankalpayak matha kriyathmaka api wenuwen api niwasa wadapiliwela yatathe nuwaraeliya disthrikkaye ranawiruwan 102kata niwasa pirinamune rikillagaskada, poramandulla madhya maha widyalayedi eeye (18) pawathi uthsawayakadiya.mahanuwara, kurunagala, mathara, hambanthota, badulla, galla, monaragala, ampara, madakapuwa, thrikunamalaya, kaluthara, kagalla, polonnaruwa, gampaha, rathnapura, mathale disthrikkawala me wana witath mema wadapiliwela kriyathmaka kara athi athara aarakshaka amathyanshaye sewa wanitha eekakaye sabhapathini ayoma rajapaksha mahathmiyage adhikshanaya yatathe thriwidha hamuda ranawiruwan athin niwasa idi kere.mewara nuwaraeliya disthrikkaye yuda hamuda ranawiruwan 57k, nawika hamuda ranawiruwan 27k saha guwan hamuda ranawiruwan 18 denek janadhipathiwarayage athin niwasawala yathuru laba gath athara ee samanga niwasawalata awashya upakarana, pasal daruwanta pasal upakaranada pirinamina.yudahamudawe sarayan ech. em. yu. ke herath, guwan hamudawe nayaka guwan bhata bi.
